body: Do you believe in witchcraft?:"A 20yr old girl, Edwina Esther Thorpe has supposedly confessed to being a witch in Wilberforce and is being kept at the chief's house for safe keeping after she accused a neighbor of "feeding 'witch meat' to an 8yr old girl and burrying a 'witch pot' inside one of the trees in the compound".
original_body: Do you believe in witchcraft?:"A 20yr old girl, Edwina Esther Thorpe has supposedly confessed to being a witch in Wilberforce and is being kept at the chief's house for safe keeping after she accused a neighbor of "feeding 'witch meat' to an 8yr old girl and burrying a 'witch pot' inside one of the trees in the compound".
title: Sierra Leone: Do you believe in witchcraft?

sentence: Do you believe in witchcraft?:"A 20yr old girl, Edwina Esther Thorpe has supposedly confessed to being a witch in Wilberforce and is being kept at the chief's house for safe keeping after she accused a neighbor of "feeding 'witch meat' to an 8yr old girl and burrying a 'witch pot' inside one of the trees in the compound".
